text_en: A computer which is well facilitated with Jaws programme is needed.
text_sw: Kompyuta iliyosaidiwa na programu ya Jawa inahitajika

text_en: Jaws aids the PWVI to get to know what is written by voice.
text_sw: Jaws huwasaidia watu wenye matatizo ya uoni kufahamu kilichoandikwa kwa njia ya sauti.

text_en: Jaws is not only for knowing what is written, but a tool for reading documents or webpages as well.
text_sw: Jaws siyo tu kwa ajili ya kufahamu kilichoandikwa, pia ni njia ya kusomea nyaraka au pia tovuti.

text_en: Jaws assist the PWVI how to write or how to read for herself/himself without consulting any other person.
text_sw: Jaws huwasaidia watu wenye matatizo ya uoni namna ya kujiandikia au kujisomea bila kuomba msaada wa mtu mwingine.

text_en: A sighted person can check if it is possible to read the result of the work using a screen.
text_sw: Mtu anayeona anaweza kuangalia kama inawezekana kusoma matokeo ya kazi hiyo kwa kutumia skrini.
